channel.title: An error in all RSS feeds?
channel.description:
This isn't anything major, but this is a problem that pops up in all of my RSS feeds and is really annoying.
[img]https://img32.imageshack.us/img32/8906/helpft.png[/img]
As you can see, the title is messed up. Is there a fix for it?

item.title: An error in all RSS feeds?
item.dc:creator: Firebringer
item.description:
Are you serious? Damn. Oh well.

Read full topic
